text: Fowler is a city in Meade County, Kansas, United States. In 2020, 534 people lived there. ==History== Fowler was laid out and platted in 1886. It was named after George Fowler, the firstl owner of the town site. Fowler was a shipping place on the Chicago, Rock Island and Pacific Railroad. ==Geography== The United States Census Bureau says that Fowler has a total area of . All of it is land. ===Weather=== The Köppen Climate Classification system says that Fowler has a semi-arid climate, shortened to "BSk" on climate maps.Climate Summary for Fowler, Kansas ==People== ===2020 census=== In 2020, there were 534 people, 207 households, and 128 families living in Fowler. The population density was . 76.2% of the people were White, 2.8% were African American, 0.6% were Native American, 10.3% were from other races, and 10.1% were from two or more races. 24.0% of the people were Hispanic or Latino of any race. ===2010 census=== In 2010, there were 590 people, 231 households, and 150 families living in Fowler. The population density was . 91.5% of the people were White, 1.0% were African American, 0.7% were Native American, 0.8% were Asian, 4.1% were from other races, and 1.9% were from two or more races. 12.9% of the people were Hispanic or Latino of any race. ===2000 census=== In 2000, there were 567 people, 234 households, and 146 families living in Fowler. The population density was 1,203.5 people per square mile (465.8/km²). 93.12% of the people were White, 0.18% were Native American, 5.29% were from other races, and 1.41% were from two or more races. 10.41% of the people were Hispanic or Latino of any race. ==Education== Two schools, Fowler Elementary School and Fowler High School, make up the Fowler Unified School District. ==Famous people== *Tim Huelskamp, former Congressman representing Kansas's 1st Congressional District. ==References== ==Other websites== ;City * City of Fowler * Fowler - Directory of Public Officials * Fowler Economic Development ;Historical * Photos of early Fowler ;Maps * Fowler City Map , KDOT Category:Cities in Meade County, Kansas
title: Fowler, Kansas
